entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
